Legacy Tax & Resolution Services & He's The Taxman

ACTIVELY SEEKING REFERRAL PARTNERS AND AFFILIATES!Referral Partnership Program where we establish a reciprocal referral relationship referring clients and important connections back and forth, primarily by making LinkedIn introductions.Affiliate Network where if a referred client engages our services, the Affiliate receives an affiliate compensation of 15% of the gross fee collected.   In this case we have an Affiliate Site that is used to make the introduction and allows you to track results of submission and projected payouts.Our Referral Partners and Affiliates are typically    Loan Officers, especially with clients with tax liens    Realtors, especially with client with tax liens     Other CPAs and EA that do not offer Tax Resolution Representation or to our extent    Accountants/Bookkeepers (We do not offer these services)    Financial Advisors, who know client paying too much in taxes    Credit Repair/Debt Settlement Agencies    Title companies/clerks, that need a tax lien subordination resource    Bankruptcy Attorneys, with client with non-dischargeable tax liabilities    Divorce Attorneys, with clients needing guidance     Real Estate Attorneys    Any other Power Partner who has clients paying too much in taxesHere is an example of the message one of our Referral Partners sends to his clients and prospects;I would like to introduce Stephan H. Brewer with Legacy Tax Resolutions Services.   He tells people that his firm does three things very well, Tax Preparation/Planning, Tax Problem Solving and Profit Maximization. It’s the profit maximization that is the key to his marketing strategy; he helps people grow their business so that they need his tax planning and high level tax preparation. It’s no wonder why he has 13 offices and tons of recommendations.In the past 6 weeks, Stephan and I have passed 40 referrals back and forth.  If your CPA is not giving you referrals, you may want to rethink that relationship.

As a CPA firm, we provide tax preparation and tax planning service focusing on active tax reduction for individuals, businesses, estates and trusts.   As  Certified Tax Resolution Specialists we also help individuals and business in  tax controversy

summary: At Legacy Tax & Resolution Services, we do four things extremely well... Tax Preparation/PlanningTax Resolution/MitigationDebt Settlement/Credit Repair,Client Business Profit Maximization/Coaching✓ Proactive Tax Planning✓ Slash your tax bill  by 5-35%✓ 100% legal tax planning strategies✓ Audit proof your business✓ Profit Maximization/Planning/Exit Strategies✓ Tax Problem ResolutionPROACTIVE TAX PLANNING: For over 16 years we have been providing proactive tax planning services to  doctors, lawyers, dentists, contractors,  entrepreneurs and small business owners. We help plan and execute 100% legal tax planning strategies that will help reduce your tax bill by 5-35%AUDIT PROOF YOUR BUSINESS: Einstein once said "the hardest thing in the world to understand is Income Taxes". Is it any wonder that most small business owners struggle to take advantage of every tax deduction legally possible?   We help craft systems, processes and procedures that simplifies record keeping. We help you navigate the treacherous waters that are the Income Tax Code.MAXIMIZE PROFITS AND REDUCE COSTS: Revenue is important but Profit is what matters most!. It makes no sense to mindlessly cut costs.  It is very important to understand if the cost is an expense or an investment and we help you understand the relationship so you can maximize profits.BUILD AND GROW YOUR BUSINESS: Value, much like beauty, is in the eye of the beholder. We help you build and grow your business so you can exit the business on your terms and get maximum value for your hard work.TAX RESOLUTION SERVICES:  If you are experiencing any of the following and need an experienced, Certified Tax Resolution Specialist (CTRS) to battle with the IRS or state agencies.-Aggressive Tax Collections-Settle or Reduce Your Tax Debt-IRS Levies, Garnishments & Seizures-Installment Agreement Or Other Alternatives-Audit Representation-Innocent Spouse-Protect Your Rights As A Taxpayer-Federal and State Resolution
name: 'Stephan Brewer, CPA, CTRS, JSM Tax
